TopicTitle: Some mods with toolbar addons cause FPS drops

Articles.Content:
So I noticed some mods, those that add buttons to toolbars cause stutter. I played 2 months with horrible FPS and told myself I have to live with it. By chance I removed the wider contracts mod and installed Contracts Window+, my FPS skyrocketed! I've installed all kind of fluff like Astronomers Pack etc, my FPS was still high.

Then I installed AmpYear Power, I noticed some FPS drop again, but not that bad, I can still play fine. 

Any ideas what can cause this?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-04T09:53:29Z" title="07/04/2015 09:53  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 4, 2015</time> by hendrack**
Most likely the mod does something each frame that could be done only one. Hard to tell without looking into the code in detail.
